summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to street-food vending, merchandise displays, and sidewalk cafes; amending Sections 11.14.450, 11.16.280, 11.23.420, 11.23.440, 11.31.121, 11.72.430, 15.02.042, 15.02.044, 15.02.046, 15.02.048, 15.04.074, 15.16.010, 15.16.012, 15.16.020, 15.16.040, 15.16.050, 15.16.060, 15.16.070, 15.16.080, 15.17.005, 15.17.050, 15.17.080, 15.17.100, 15.17.150, 15.17.200, 15.91.010, and 15.91.016 of the Seattle Municipal Code; adding Sections 11.14.157, 11.14.227, 11.14.228, 11.72.195, 15.16.075, 15.17.006, 15.17.007, 15.17.008, 15.17.009, 15.17.120, 15.17.130, 15.17.152, and 15.17.250; repealing Chapter 10.10, and Sections 10.03.110, 15.17.010, and 15.17.020; amending the current Seattle Department of Transportation Street Use fee schedule by adding new vending-related Street Use permit use codes and amending vending-related Street Use permit fees.
